EmailTemplate.description: *Internal* This template is used to send notification that work has been completed for client tickets.
EmailTemplate.name: Completion of Work Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Account} - Work Completed - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CIS Installation Completion
Agency Name: {!Case.Account}
Contact Information :
Work Completed:
Environment Type: {!Case.Environment_Type__c}
Workstations/Clients Upgraded:
Issues Encountered:
Issues Outstanding:
Date and Time started:
Date and Time Completed:
Total Time
Downtime:
Sales Order Number:
Work Order Link: {!Case.Link}
SF - Hardware/Software records updated: (must enter yes) Yes
